verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm of David <WH1732>. The fool <WH5036> hath said <WH559> <WH8804> in his heart <WH3820>, There is no 'Elohim <WH430>. They are corrupt <WH7843> <WH8689>, they have done abominable <WH8581> <WH8689> works <WH5949>, there is none that doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> good <WH2896>.

The YY <WH3068> looked down <WH8259> <WH8689> from heaven <WH8064> upon the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>, to see <WH7200> <WH8800> if there <WH3426> were any that did understand <WH7919> <WH8688>, and seek <WH1875> <WH8802> 'Elohim <WH430>.
They are all gone aside <WH5493> <WH8804>, they are all together <WH3162> become filthy <WH444> <WH8738>: there is none that doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> good <WH2896>, no, not one <WH259>.

Have all the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205> no knowledge <WH3045> <WH8804>? who eat up <WH398> <WH8802> my people <WH5971> as they eat <WH398> <WH8804> bread <WH3899>, and call <WH7121> <WH8804> not upon the YY <WH3068>.
There were they in great <WH6343> fear <WH6342> <WH8804>: for 'Elohim <WH430> is in the generation <WH1755> of the righteous <WH6662>.
Ye have shamed <WH954> <WH8686> the counsel <WH6098> of the poor <WH6041>, because the YY <WH3068> is his refuge <WH4268>.

Oh that <WH5414> <WH8799> the salvation <WH3444> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were come out of TZiyon <WH6726> ! when the YY <WH3068> bringeth back <WH7725> <WH8800> the captivity <WH7622> of his people <WH5971>, Ya`akov <WH3290> shall rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall be glad <WH8055> <WH8799>.
